FuncDef:
The peer command creates and displays the VNI peer view.
The undo peer command deletes the configured VNI peer view. The peer command creates and displays the VNI peer view. The undo peer command deletes the configured VNI peer view. By default, no VNI peer view is created. This command is supported only on the CE6863H, CE6863H-K, CE6860-SAN, CE6866K, CE6866, CE6860-HAM, CE6855-48XS8CQ, CE6885-SAN, CE8850-SAN, CE8855, CE8851-32CQ4BQ, CE8851K, CE8851-32CQ8DQ-P, CE8850-HAM, CE6881H, CE6881H-K, CE6885, CE6885-T, CE6885-LL (standard forwarding mode) and CE6863E-48S8CQ.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the IP address of a peer network virtualization edge.
The address is in dotted decimal notation.

ExtraInfo: To set attributes for a specified peer VNI in the VNI peer view, run the peer command to create and display the VNI peer view.
